summary:
Adds a player owned home to Skyrim throbbing with
warmth and coziness, yet containing all the necessities
a journeying player could ask for. Includes a follower!
descriptionHtml:
==================
Requirements:
==================
Latest version of Skyrim.

ApachiiSky Hair mod: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
*Please note, at this current time I DO NOT support non-Apachii
hairstyles for the NPC(s) used in this mod. I will be
accommodating vanilla hairstyles in a future update.
==================
OPTIONAL, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED:
<>Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
*Please note, the NPC(s) included in this mod are all based off CBBE, and as such
Vanilla or UNP bodies may not be very attractive.

<>Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE Armor Replacer: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654/?
<>I have used Climates of Tamriel, and an ENB in my screenshots.


==================
Description:
==================
PLEASE NOTE THIS IS CURRENTLY A BETA

THIS IS MY FIRST MOD, SO BE KIND *.^

Adds a player owned home to Skyrim throbbing with
warmth and coziness, yet containing all the necessities
a journeying player could ask for. Includes a follower!

==================
Details:
==================
LOCATION: Head over to Vilemyr Inn, Ivarstead;
collect a book atop a barrel in the far right hand corner.
The book contains directions to Mistress Woodland Refuge.

When you arrive at Mistress Woodland Refuge, a satchel containing
the gate key is at the bottom of the stairs. You do not need
to keep the key once the gate is unlocked.

==================
Installation:
==================
Use NMM :)

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Skyrim folder.
2) Make sure the .esp is checked in the Launcher.


==================
Un-Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Dismiss the NPC Follower (Mistress Satyria) if she is following you.
2) Delete the .esp from your Data files.
3) Uncheck the Basic Template.esp in the Launcher.


==================
Upgrading:
==================
1) Remove all items from the Refuge that you wish to keep.
2) Dismiss Satyria.
3) Uninstall the mod.


==================
Incompatible:
==================
None so far -please let me know ASAP if you find any :)
(Anything that edits the geometry the the West of Riften, and South-East of Ivarstead)

==================
Known Issues:
==================
1) NavMesh not 100% complete, so other followers can't enter the Refuge.
2) As of yet, Mistress Satyria will not return to the Refuge when dismissed (testing required).
3) Respawning chest for resources won't respawn.

==================
Changelog:
==================

04/01/2014 - Beta Release
author: AfricanPr0
